trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Greensburg
There was one other sighting in Greensburg on or around June 29th 2008
divs: sighting detailson sunday, 6\29\2008, at approximately 10:15pm, i was sitting on my porch having a cigarette. i often look up to the sky to watch the stars. on this particular night, i looked up to the sky and saw what i thought was the brightest star ever. i continued to watch it. i was going to get my husband but it was only there for a few moments then suddenly moved behind the clouds. it continued to move northeast, then it was gone. i thought this to be strange and kept wondering what it could have been. my boss was talking one day at work and mentioned seeing something quite similar on the same night and around the same time.
Summary: Saw star-like object in sky; it then moved behind the clouds and continued moving northeast.
